full_summary:
### Fire Alarm Annual Inspection
#### Title (English/French): 
Fire Alarm Annual Inspection / Inspection annuelle des systèmes d’alarme incendie

#### Reference Number: 
cb-441-7634322
#### Amendment Number: 
6
#### Solicitation Number: 
53000-24-4581439

#### Announcement Details: 
- **Publication Date (Date de publication):** January 12, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date (Date limite d’appel d’offres):** February 20, 2024, 15:00
- **Amendment Date (Date de modification):** February 20, 2024
- **Expected Contract Start Date (Date de début prévue du contrat):** April 1, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date (Date prévue de fin du contrat):** March 31, 2029

#### Tender Status: 
Expired / Expiré 

#### Tender Details: 
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumission)
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions )
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)
- **Trade Agreements:**
  - Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  - Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  - Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  - Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  - Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  - Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  - Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  - Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  - Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  - World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  - Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- **Regions of Opportunity (Régions d’opportunité):** Drumheller
- **Regions of Delivery (Régions de livraison):** Drumheller

#### Contracting Entity/End-User Information:
- Contracting Entity: Corrections Service Canada (LÉ service correctionnel du Canada)
- Entity Address: 3427 Faithfull Ave, Saskatoon, Saskatchewan S7K8H6
- Entity Contact: Katherine Booth, [501.Contracts@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:501.Contracts@csc-scc.gc.ca
